SEARCH
Package net.itsrelizc.itemlib

Class RelizcItemStack

java.lang.Object
net.itsrelizc.itemlib.RelizcItemStack
public class RelizcItemStack extends Object
A custom Relizc SMP class containing metadata for original Bukkit items. This intended to look like and feel like Minecraft Forge's item API and can create items with decorators, despite the fact that the user have to register it during initialization. Please note that this class does not extend Bukkit ItemStack nor Mojang's ItemStack. Please use getBukkitItem() to convert it to Bukkit items, which is safe enough to keep its essential RelizcItem NBT tags and convert it back later. When comparing RelizcItemStacks, do not use double equals operator. Instead, please use equals(Object)
See Also:
  • ItemStack

    • getBukkitItem

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getBukkitItem()

      Returns:

    • getUniqueId

      public UUID getUniqueId()
      Gets the Unique ID of this item when created. Note that this only works for RelizcItems or regular mojang items that are considered unstackable.
      Returns:
      The Unique ID of this unstackable item.
      See Also:
